Matchmaker - Unnamed Package中的类
Class Matchmaker is mainly for filtering applications and matching applications to jobs, but also contains method for generating statistic for audit system.
Matchmaker(ArrayList<Job>, ArrayList<Application>) - 类的构造器 Matchmaker
Class constructor specifying total jobs and total applications.
matchMaking(Job, ArrayList<Application>) - 类中的静态方法 Matchmaker
